name: Karen Rogers
text: Would have given higher than 5 stars if available. Great team to work with from the beginning to the end. Everything was handled in a professional and timely manner by great staff. We love our door! Paid a lot less than purchasing from big box and received a much better detailed and quality product.

name: Garry Bird
text: We received our refinished front door today.  It took about 3 1/2 weeks from removal to reinstallation, and it was worth the wait.  The door was refinished much better than anticipated--the door faces the afternoon sun and hadn't been maintained since installation five years ago.  I'm also very impressed with the two people who removed the door, came by a few times to refinish the outside trim, and reinstall the door.  They were so professional and very informative.  I really recommend this company.  The quality of the service we got was extraordinary.

name: JK nerdy
text: The doors, glass, and hardware here are beautiful! They make all kinds of amazing units for new homes or retro fit. Having worked with them for many years, I can tell you they are great people as well.

name: Riverside Transmission
text: The Only Place to Buy Doors !  Most Beautiful Doors I've ever seen , and that's what All my neighbors say too, and I live in a high dollar neighborhood .  Doors were ready Ahead of schedule, people are Great , the bid was in Plane English not door shop short hand.  We had some issues and they took care of it , they stand behind their work .  If you're not sure which wood, Get the Mahogany  you will stare at it in amazement   for hours .  God Bless these people.

name: Brenda Dolan
text: We purchased a 10 foot tall and approximately 6 feet wide arched double custom made front entry door. It is absolutely gorgeous !! We worked closely with JK to get the exact stain and hardware we wanted. They are professional throughout the whole process! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for your kind review. We would love to have a picture to put on our website.

name: Mary Battaglia
text: Very helpful professional people to assist me with the decisions about the doors. Very patient and made useful suggestions. Great service.

resp.text: Thanks for the nice review. We hope you enjoy your new door!!

name: Beth Kent
text: Website easy

name: Russell Lamkin
text: Beautiful doors and stained glass by a company that stands behind what they sell.

name: Robert Blackshear
text: Had a single stain glass window and frame Norman, OK First Baptist Church 1890’s . Missing some pieces and some cracks(character lines) Just saw finished work. So pleased with quality of work. Enjoyed meeting Ken and touring the Shop.

name: Let's Go Solutions, LLC
text: Purchased two (2) 12" x 12" waterfall glass panels to set in remodeled kitchen cabinet doors.  The end product  was stunning and the customer was more than pleased. The customer service was professional and helpful and the price for the two panels was super economical!  Thank you!
